remarks: Associative law for scalar product.  ( ~ lmodvsass analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clmvsdir.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
clmvsass $p |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q x. R ) .x. X ) = ( Q .x. ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
